body:
Sorry there should be a `buf->Ref()`. It's fixed now.

`DMAHelper::buffer(&val)` does return a `const TensorBuffer*` so I will just make `buf` that type. It should be fine.
body_html:
Sorry there should be a buf->Ref(). It's fixed now.

DMAHelper::buffer(&val) does return a const TensorBuffer* so I will just make buf that type. It should be fine.
body_text:
Sorry there should be a buf->Ref(). It's fixed now.
DMAHelper::buffer(&val) does return a const TensorBuffer* so I will just make buf that type. It should be fine.
